title: Asia Bambus
typeOfFood: Ovo, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu lists some vegetarian items though not all are suitable for vegans - need to explain in German what you require (staff speak only German). Three of the vegetarian items are vegan and come with tofu, and the vegetarian egg rolls are vegan. Has fresh juices. A private room is available for groups.
